title: On my previous phone Nexus 5x, I set in settings Maximum number of apps to 5. After transfer setting
content: On my previous phone Nexus 5x, in settings, I have set Maximum number of apps to 5. After transfer my settings to my new phone - Pixel 2, this setting was also transferred. I would like to change this setting, but it is not in the menu anymnore. I have asked help Goole repeatedly, but no answer. Please help how to change it, thank you Jaromir
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 2
